description: San choy bow has never been easier. Using a recipe base quickly gets you flavourful pork mince to fill fresh lettuce cups with. Top with coriander and enjoy.
name: Continental San Choy Bow Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Continental chow mein mince recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium pan and brown mince. Add recipe base, mushrooms, cabbage and water stir well. Cover and simmer gently for 10 minutes or until mince is cooked. Stir through shallots.
Spoon warm mixture into individual lettuce cups. Top with bean shoots and coriander and serve immediately.
